name: Odsreader
tagline: Python class to read simple Libreoffice Calc's documents (ods)
body:
### Welcome to .ods reader.
This is a python file written and checked in python 2.7 

Until now I was converted my odses to xls in order to access the data through xlrd.

I accidentally went to:
http://code.activestate.com/recipes/436066-read-openoffice-spreadsheet-as-list-of-lists-witho/

which helped me understood and create that python script.

In the near future I will add a python script to help those that cannot understand how to use it.
And probably I will extend it to do more things...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
